tuv.seg: The Workplace Relations Commission provides a Mediation Service, which aims to resolve workplace disputes and disagreements, particularly between individuals or small groups

Soláthraíonn an Coimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre Seirbhís Idirghabhála san Áit Oibre, leis an aidhm chun díospóidí agus easaontuithe sa láthair oibre a réiteach, go háirithe idir daoine aonair nó grúpaí beaga
This confidential service gives employees and employers in dispute with each other an opportunity to work with a mediator to find a mutually agreed solution to the problem

Is tríd an tseirbhís rúnda sin a thugtar deis d’fhostaithe agus d’fhostóirí atá i mbun díospóide lena chéile chun saothrú leis an idirghabháilaí chun teacht ar réiteach comhaontaithe le chéile don fhadhb
Workplace mediation is a voluntary process which needs to have both sides agreeing to participate and to work towards a solution to the problem
Is próiseas saorálach í an idirghabháil óna dteastaíonn an dá pháirtí bheith ag comhaontú chun rannpháirt a ghlacadh inti agus chun saothrú i dtreo réiteach na faidhbe
If no agreed solution is reached, other ways of resolving the issues will have to be used

Seirbhís Luath-Réitigh: Má rinne tú gearán faoi do chearta fostaíochta agus más mian leat téigh i ngleic le headráin, is amhlaidh i gcásanna áirithe a fhéadfar an tSeirbhís Luath-Réitigh a thairiscint duit atá cuid den tSeirbhís Idirghabhála
In that situation the mediator will assist the participants to decide how best to proceed. You can read more in our document on employment rights enforcement
Má aontaíonn tá an bheirt páirtí, téann an tSeirbhís Luath-Réitigh i dteagmháil leo tríd an ghuthán chun an díospóid a réiteach tríd idirghabhála

Early Resolution Service: If you have made a complaint about your employment rights, and you are willing to engage in mediation, in certain cases you may be offered the Early Resolution Service (ERS) which is part of the Mediation Service

Mura dtagtar ar réiteach comhaontaithe, is amhlaidh a chaithfear leas a bhaint as bealaí eile chun saincheisteanna a réiteach. Tabharfaidh an idirghabhálaí cúnamh do na rannpháirtithe sa chúinse úd chun teacht ar chinneadh faoin gcaoi is fearr chun dul ar aghaidh
If both parties are agreeable, the ERS contacts them by phone in order to resolve the dispute through mediation
Is féidir leat a thuilleadh a léamh inár gcáipéis faoi fhorghníomhú na gceart fostaíochta
Why use workplace mediation?
Cén fáth a mbainfí leas as eadráin sa láthair oibre?
The advantage of using workplace mediation is that it allows a problem to be resolved informally, by ensuring that all the sides are heard
Is é an buntáiste a bhaineann le leas na idirghabhála sa láthair oibre ná go ligtear d’fhuascailt na faidhbe go neamhfhoirmiúil, trína chinntiú go n-éistear leis na taobhanna go léir
As they work together to solve the problem, the resolution of it is in the control of the participants
Is faoi na rannpháirtithe chun teacht ar réiteach de réir mar a shaothraíonn siad le chéile chun fuascailte na faidhbe
Where they are committed to a mutually agreed solution it is likely to be more effective and last longer
Is dócha go mbeidh réiteach comhaontaithe níos éifeachtaí agus go mairfidh sé níos faide mar a mbíonn siad tiomanta dó
Also, as workplace mediation is used before the issue is referred for adjudication
Is amhlaidh freisin a bhaintear leas as an idirghabháil sa láthair oibre sula dtarchuirtear an tsaincheist faoi bhreithniúchán
The type of situations that are dealt with by the Mediation Service include:
Áirítear leis na cineálacha cúinsí a bpléann an tSeirbhís Idirghabháil leo:
• Where there are personal differences or people have problems working together
• Mar a n-éiríonn idir daoine ina saolta pearsanta nó ag obair le chéile
• Where a working relationship has broken down
• Mar ar cliseadh ar chaidreamh oibre
• Where issues have arisen from a grievance and disciplinary procedure
• Mar ar éirigh saincheisteanna aníos ó ghnás casaoide agus smachta
• Where there are industrial relations issues that have not been referred through statutory dispute resolution processes
• Mar a mbíonn saincheisteanna caidrimh thionsclaíoch ann nár tarchuireadh trí phróisis réitigh dhíospóide reachtúla
The Mediation Service operates according to the following principles:
Feidhmíonn an tSeirbhís Idirghabhála de réir na bprionsabal seo a leanas:
• It is a voluntary process, all parties must agree to participate
• Is próiseas saorálach é, a gcaitheann gach páirtí chun rannpháirt a ghlacadh ann
• Anyone who wishes to withdraw from it may do so at any stage
• Is féidir le haon pháirtí ar mian leo tarraingt siar uaidh ag céim ar bith
• The whole process is confidential unless the parties agree otherwise
• Bíonn an próiseas go léir rúnda mura gcomhaontaíonn na páirtithe a mhalairt
• It is fast and starts as soon as everyone is available
• Is próiseas gasta é agus tosaíonn sé chomh luath agus a bhíonn gach duine ar fáil
• The mediator is impartial
• Is neamhchlaonta é an idirghabhálaí
• Its focus is to find a solution to the dispute which is agreeable to all parties and which will work
• Díríonn sí ar réiteach don díospóid a fhuascailt ar féidir le gach páirtí aontú ina leith agus a oibreoidh go maith
The aim of the process is to allow each person involved in the dispute the opportunity to be heard and to work with the other party to reach a solution
Is éard is aidhm leis an bpróiseas chun ligean do gach aon duine lena mbaineann sa díospóid chun an deis éisteachta a fháil agus chun saothrú leis an bpáirtí eile chun teacht ar réiteach éigin
It is a flexible process which may involve joint meetings or meetings with the mediator alone, depending on the particular situation
Is próiseas solúbtha é ina bhféadann comhchruinnithe nó cruinnithe leis an eadránaí amháin tarlú, ag brath ar an gcúinse faoi leith
You can find more information in these frequently asked questions about workplace mediation
Is féidir leat teacht ar a thuilleadh faisnéise sna ceisteanna coitianta seo maidir leis an idirghabháil sa láthair oibre
It is best if both parties apply jointly for workplace mediation
Is fearr má dhéanann an dá pháirtí comhiarratas don eadráin sa láthair oibre
Mediation is most effective where both parties agree to participate
Is éifeachtaí an idirghabháil mar a gcomhaontaíonn an dá pháirtí chun bheith rannpháirteach inti
If one party does not agree the Mediation Service will work to get both parties to attend but as it is a voluntary process, participation can not be enforced

Mura gcomhaontaíonn páirtí amháin is amhlaidh a oibreoidh an tSeirbhís Idirghabhála chun is go bhfreastalóidh an dá pháirtí uirthi, ach ní féidir an freastal a fhorghníomhú óir gur próiseas saorálach atá inti
Applications should be made in writing to the Mediation Service of the Workplace Relations Commission using the online mediation referral form or by post using the address below

Ba cheart na hiarratais a dhéanamh i scríbhinn chuig an tSeirbhís Idirghabhála de chuid an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre trí leas a bhaint as an bhfoirm tarchurtha eadrána ar líne nó trí phost ag baint leasa as an seoladh thíos
The application should include the name and contact details of both parties, the number of people involved and a brief description of the problem
Ba cheart go n-áireofaí leis an iarratas ainm agus sonraí teagmhála an dá pháirtí, líon na ndaoine lena mbaineann agus tuairisc ghairid ar an bhfadhb
